Name: VMProcess
Description: Process data for servers collected by the Service Map and VM Insights solutions using the Dependency agent and Log analytics agent.

Properties.Name: TimeGenerated
Properties.Description: Date and time the record was created.

Properties.Name: Computer
Properties.Description: The name of the computer.

Properties.Name: AgentId
Properties.Description: Unique ID for the dependency agent installed on the server.

Properties.Name: Machine
Properties.Description: The machine name of the server.

Properties.Name: Process
Properties.Description: The name of the process.

Properties.Name: ExecutableName
Properties.Description: The name of the process executable

Properties.Name: DisplayName
Properties.Description: The friendly display name of the process

Properties.Name: Role
Properties.Description: The role of the process.

Properties.Name: Group
Properties.Description: The process group name for the process

Properties.Name: StartTime
Properties.Description: The process pool start time

Properties.Name: FirstPid
Properties.Description: The first PID in the process pool

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The process description

Properties.Name: CompanyName
Properties.Description: The name of the company

Properties.Name: InternalName
Properties.Description: The internal name

Properties.Name: ProductName
Properties.Description: The name of the product

Properties.Name: ProductVersion
Properties.Description: The product version

Properties.Name: FileVersion
Properties.Description: The file version

Properties.Name: ExecutablePath
Properties.Description: The path to the executable file

Properties.Name: CommandLine
Properties.Description: The command line

Properties.Name: WorkingDirectory
Properties.Description: The working directory

Properties.Name: Services
Properties.Description: A list of services associated with the process.

Properties.Name: UserName
Properties.Description: The account under which the process is executing

Properties.Name: UserDomain
Properties.Description: The domain under which the process is executing

Properties.Name: TenantId
Properties.Description: ID of the worksapce that stores this record

Properties.Name: SourceSystem
Properties.Description: The source of the data collected (OpsManager)
